div.p: Rochester CUSD3A Schools are located in Rochester, IL and strive to provide excellence in education for all students Pre-K through grade 12. Currently, we have five main education centers and an administrative center.

p.span: Welcome to Rochester Community Unit School District 3A. As our etymological history and Village Coat of Arms suggest, our community and school district are the "fortified bridge" to the future of, for, and through our children. This is our new website; many have worked long and hard to prepare it for you. We hope that you will visit not just our website, but also our community. We love it here; we know that you will, too.

div.p: Rochester CUSD 3A does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Rochester CUSD 3A also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
